verses.name: Ezekiel 19:12
verses.text: But she was plucked up in fury, she was cast down to the ground, and the east wind dried up her fruit: her strong rods were broken and withered; the fire consumed them.

verses.name: Ezekiel 19:13
verses.text: And now she is planted in the wilderness, in a dry and thirsty ground.

verses.name: Ezekiel 19:14
verses.text: And fire is gone out of a rod of her branches, which hath devoured her fruit, so that she hath no strong rod to be a sceptre to rule. This is a lamentation, and shall be for a lamentation.
